sections.text: Releases a toxic chemical subject to regulation in accordance with 40 CFR 372;
Generates hazardous waste subject to regulation in accordance with 40 CFR 261, 262, 263, or 264; or

The Mayor shall require the submission of additional source reduction and recycling data collected in accordance with section 6607 of the Pollution Prevention Act, or other federal legislation or regulations.
EPA Form R, and any additional data required, shall be signed by a senior-level manager who shall be liable for any inaccuracies contained in the submission.
